meanings.definition: A person who prepares or makes something ready for use or consideration.
meanings.sent1: The preparators in the kitchen were busy chopping vegetables for the soup.
meanings.sent2: The team of preparators set up the stage for the concert.
meanings.sent3: The preparators at the party made sure the music playlist was perfect.
meanings.sent4: She was like a preparator of dreams, carefully crafting each detail.
meanings.sent5: The preparators transformed the empty room into a cozy reading nook.

meanings.definition: An organization or individual responsible for preparing or arranging something.
meanings.sent1: The preparators from the event planning company decorated the venue beautifully.
meanings.sent2: The preparators of the exhibition ensured all the artworks were displayed correctly.
meanings.sent3: The preparators for the surprise party kept the secret so well.
meanings.sent4: The preparators of the project mapped out every step meticulously.
meanings.sent5: The preparators of the ceremony made sure everything ran smoothly.
